snippet: The ballet, which canceled an American performance in 2012, will bring Adolphe Adam’s “Giselle” and three other programs to the David H. Koch Theater in November.
abstract: The ballet, which canceled an American performance in 2012, will bring Adolphe Adam’s “Giselle” and three other programs to the David H. Koch Theater in November.

headline.main: Mikhailovsky Ballet to Make American Debut at Koch Theater
headline.print_headline: Mikhailovsky Ballet Sets Dates at Koch Theater
